item.title: Accept That it’s Your Fault
item.description: Accept That it’s Your Fault Accept that it’s your fault. You are accountable for everything. Mistakes aren’t “the team’s” fault. They are your (the leader’s) fault.

item.title: Consistency Beats Intensity
item.description: Consistency Beats Intensity How to be in the top 1%: 4+ hours of deep work. 30+ minutes of exercise. Repeat every day.

item.title: Share in the Credit
item.description: Share in the Credit Share in the credit Most say “take blame, pass credit.” But I say take blame, share in the credit.
